basics.name: Ryota Seki
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.company: University of Hawaii Information Technology Services
highlights: Develop web applications using modern tools, frameworks and languages like Java, AngularJS, Maven, and SpringBoot
Collaborate with peers and senior developers during weekly meetings for code review
Create documentation for various processes to assist future developers and facilitate efficient training practices.

work.company: University of Hawaii Information Technology Services
highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Add and update data into the support call tracking system
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk
Provide in-person support for basic hardware and application issues
Manage network resources using Microsoft Administrative Tools such as Active Directory, Microsoft Exchange, and other system administration tools.
Ensure compliance of network user accounts and computers by using Active Directory and Group Policy.
Utilize ticketing system to process user requests to track various issues and resolve them in a timely manner.

certifications.title: Security+
certifications.summary: CompTIA Security+ is a global certification that validates the baseline skills you need to perform core security functions and pursue an IT security career.

certifications.title: A+
certifications.summary: CompTIA A+ is the preferred qualifying credential for technical support and IT operational roles. It is about much more than PC repair.
